title: HD Motion Turbine
summary: A Turbo fanjet Style watch face for Moto 360,LG G Watch R & other android wear
description: Model NumberDW-A06CategoryCreativeProduct description Motion Turbine is a  creative watch face for all smart watches, a turbofan with a type of air breathing fanjet effect in a steady endless projection, makes it very interesting. (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features•	smooth/tick needles•	moving turbine(fan)•	square & round watches supportAnd it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates, don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!Follow Us on Twitter !  http://www.twitter.com/droiipd Like Us on Facebook !  http://www.facebook.com/droiipdFollow Us on Instagram !  https://www.instagram.com/droiipdFollow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188It has following featuresFeatures: •	smooth/tick needles•	moving turbine(fan)•	square & round watches supportConfiguration:  •	switch needle style smooth & tick•	Turn On/Off turbine or fanFor Email support Contact us at  droiipd@gmail.comTip 1Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watchesTip 2✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Motion Turbine Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
descriptionHTML:
Model Number
DW-A06

Category
Creative

Product description

Motion Turbine is a creative watch face for all smart watches, a turbofan with a type of air breathing fanjet effect in a steady endless projection, makes it very interesting. (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features

• smooth/tick needles
• moving turbine(fan)
• square & round watches support


And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)

Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188
It has following features
Features:
• smooth/tick needles
• moving turbine(fan)
• square & round watches support

Configuration:
• switch needle style smooth & tick
• Turn On/Off turbine or fan
For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Motion Turbine Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
comments: No turning without paying I think the motion of the turbine blades is supposed to be the main feature. This is unavailable without payment.
Turbine watch face Love the animation. .!
Fun Makes me dizzy sometimes, lol!
1st Stage Cool watch face design,  turbine inlet look,  similar to the very expensive perrelet watch design.  Looks great...
Cool stylish watch right on my moto 360 Love this watchface
